lead_paragraph: A bungee jumping instructor was killed in a weekend leap from a hot air balloon in what an association for the sport said today was the first bungee-related death in the United States. The victim, Hal Mark Irish of La Mirada, fell more than 60 feet to his death on Sunday after he became detached from his bungee cord during a demonstration south of the Perris Valley Airport and Parachuting Center, the authorities said.

headline.main: Bungee Instructor Dies When Cord Detaches
